version_description: Fixed the Facebook login issue.
Fixed the Facebook login issue.

Dear Commanders,
We have released the V2.008 update. You can download the update on App Store
This is not a compulsory update. You can decide whether to download it at your own discretion.

1. Fixed: Malfunction of the User Agreement notice when the application is started for the first time.
2. Fixed: Display of conditions to unlock certain functions in the game.
3. Fixed: Abnormal text in push notifications.
4. Fixed: Abnormal display of purchased Gem amount on the 7-Day Frontline Supplies event page.
5. Fixed: Abnormal display of level requirement for high rarity equipment.
6. Improved: Issue with the size of the Switch button in battle.
7. Improved: Incomplete names for certain Combat Missions.

Dear Commanders,
We have released the V2.008 update. You can download the update on App Store
This is not a compulsory update. You can decide whether to download it at your own discretion.

1. Fixed: Malfunction of the User Agreement notice when the application is started for the first time.
2. Fixed: Display of conditions to unlock certain functions in the game.
3. Fixed: Abnormal text in push notifications.
4. Fixed: Abnormal display of purchased Gem amount on the 7-Day Frontline Supplies event page.
5. Fixed: Abnormal display of level requirement for high rarity equipment.
6. Improved: Issue with the size of the Switch button in battle.
7. Improved: Incomplete names for certain Combat Missions.
Fixed: Clearing cache data deletes your Guest account.
Fixed: Clearing cache data deletes your Guest account.
Fixed: Clearing cache data deletes your Guest account.
Fixed: Clearing cache data deletes your Guest account.

1. [Optimized] Improved the top-up function for iOS users, there is less chance of not receiving Gems after top-up.
2. [Fixed] Text alignment of the acquisition interface of Challenger Medal.
3. [Fixed] Text alignment of back-end notification pushes.
4. [Fixed] Text alignment of Welrod Mk II’s acquisition lines.
5. [Fixed] Text alignment of Costume and gift descriptions.
6. [Fixed] Text alignment of the Furniture Trade-In interface.
7. [Fixed] Text alignment of the Equipment Preset interface.
8. [Fixed] Text alignment of T-Doll Obtain Methods in the Index.

[Fixed] Invalid verification email received when registering a Sunborn account.
[Fixed] Invalid verification email received when registering a Sunborn account.

Update Contents for V2.0221:
1. Added: Date of Oath. The date of oath will be displayed on the profile page of an oathed T-Doll.
2. Added: T-Doll recovery feature. Players can recover a lost T-Doll if they have already unlocked her Index Page while do not have the corresponding T-Doll in the Armory.
3. Added: Furniture exchange. 4 and 5-star furniture sets from past time-limited Re-supply Gachas are now available in the Black Card Exchange.
4. Preset arrangement. Players can apply the preset layout of a themed furniture set to a Dorm through “Warehouse-Check set”. Furniture pieces in the Dorm previously will be taken back into the Warehouse.
5. Added: AR photography. This feature allows players to take pictures with their favorite T-Dolls.
6. Optimization: Existing functions and features are improved.

Update Contents for V2.0221:
1. Added: Date of Oath. The date of oath will be displayed on the profile page of an oathed T-Doll.
2. Added: T-Doll recovery feature. Players can recover a lost T-Doll if they have already unlocked her Index Page while do not have the corresponding T-Doll in the Armory.
3. Added: Furniture exchange. 4 and 5-star furniture sets from past time-limited Re-supply Gachas are now available in the Black Card Exchange.
4. Preset arrangement. Players can apply the preset layout of a themed furniture set to a Dorm through “Warehouse-Check set”. Furniture pieces in the Dorm previously will be taken back into the Warehouse.
5. Added: AR photography. This feature allows players to take pictures with their favorite T-Dolls.
6. Optimization: Existing functions and features are improved.

New Features
1. Now players can choose to run an Auto-Battle up to 3 times in a row when starting an Auto-Battle.
2. The limits of infrastructures are increased.
3. New facility in Auxiliary Room "Rescue Station" that gives pet birds.
4. A button to collect all output in T-Doll/Equipment Production.
5. Auto-play feature and dialogue log in story mode.
Optimizations
1. Great improvements on performance. Much lower chance of game crash.
2. Smaller game size.
3. A more convenient planning mode.
4. Officially recommended recipes for crafting T-Dolls and equipment are added to the production log.
5. Special voice lines unlocked by costumes will be accessible in the Index.
6. Optimized map drop display. Now players can view the details of map drop in Combat Summary. Possible drops of an individual enemy can be displayed by long-pressing the unit's icon.
7. When a player's battery has reached the limit, the excess will be left in the condenser when the player collects the battery.
8. When obtaining Training Data from collecting rewards or purchasing packages, the excess that surpasses the limit (9,999) will be kept.
Fixes
1. T-Dolls' voice lines will no longer overlap.
2. Abnormal firing animation of some T-Dolls in skill training are fixed.
3. Mail title will no longer disappear after a mail is opened.

Bugs fixed.
Bugs fixed.

1. New homepage layout.
2. All event banners on the homepage's bottom-left can be displayed together by long-pressing any banner and dragging it upwards.
3. A new navigation bar in the secondary menus has been added. It can be opened by tapping the highlighted icon on the top-left and it gives you quick access to various functions.
4. Daily and weekly quests will be displayed separately. Each tab will have a progress counter and you can switch between the 2 tabs.
5. The layout of T-Doll and Fairy profiles in the index has been adjusted.
6. There will be a Push Notification upon the completion of an Exploration and the automatic commencement of a new Exploration.
7. A problem that would cause T-Dolls to be misplaced when she joins an Echelon has been fixed.
Minor bug fixed.

1. Added: 3D Stronghold View. The "Dorm" and the "Auxiliary Rooms" will be accessible in the Stronghold interface.
2. Added: Exploration system. Accessible through Auxiliary Room – Forward Basecamp.
3. Added: Commander customization. You can now customize your own appearance.
4. Added: 60 FPS support. You can now enable/disable 60 FPS mode in Setting.
5. Optimized: You can now preview a costume in the costume package.
6. Optimized: Improved game performance and shorter loading time.
7. Optimized: When in enemy turn, the speed of enemy actions is increased by 50%.
8. Optimized: You can now collect batteries during 22:00 – 01:00 UTC-8.
9. Optimized: Improved SFX during gameplay.
10. Fixed: A problem that will interrupt the planning mode.
11. Fixed: Other minor bugs.

New Content:
Target Practice System
Quick Formation
I. O. P. Special Order system
Battles: Battlefield /Combat Settings
Supporter Display →Adjutant display

Other optimizations:
1. Ability to select all 4-star furniture when scrapping furniture
2. Pet adoption screen now shows existing number of a particular pet
3. Able to log in via Apple ID

V2.0700 Update Content
1. Added: “Target Saving” is a new feature in the Target Practice System. This feature will enable you to add enemies you encounter in combat to your target collection for future practice.
You can save the enemies through the following ways:
Long press the enemy in the map and tap Add Target in the enemy details page.
Pause the combat to add the current enemies into Target Collection.
When you lose a battle, you can add enemies into your Target Collection.

2. Added: HOC General Data is a new item that can be obtained through Intelligence Analysis in the Intelligence Center for unlocking and upgrading HOC units.
HOC General Data are incompatible with HOC units that have not been added to Intelligence Analysis.

3. Added: New options for skill cut-in animations will be added to Settings>Battle. Skill cut-in animations for T-Doll echelons or Coalition echelons can be set to “off”, “play once” (per day), or “on”.
4. Added: Certain characters in the story (human or otherwise) can now be appointed as Assistants. Clear certain maps to unlock them.
5. Added: The interfaces for Black Card exchange will also be optimized with the addition of sorting and filtering options.
6. Optimized: The interfaces for Procurement, time-limited token redemption, and Black Card exchange will be optimized.
7. Optimized: Enemy Units in Index will be optimized with the addition of enemy chibis.
8. Optimized: Event page will be optimized.
9. Optimized: Item classification in the Shop will be optimized. Costume Packages can now be previewed directly on the Shop interface.
10. Optimized: The Item interface will be optimized with the addition of item introductions and ways to obtain each item.
11. Optimized: Special effects are no longer bound to their respective Commander costume sets. Commanders can now freely equip any special effects that are already in their Wardrobe.
12. Optimized: The interface of Wardrobe and Clothes Shop of Commander Costumes will be optimized with a more unified version. Commander can select and match clothes more conveniently.

You can save the enemies through the following ways:

2. Added: HOC General Data is a new item that can be obtained through Intelligence Analysis in the Intelligence Center for unlocking and upgrading HOC units.
HOC General Data are incompatible with HOC units that have not been added to Intelligence Analysis.

3. Added: New options for skill cut-in animations will be added to Settings>Battle. Skill cut-in animations for T-Doll echelons or Coalition echelons can be set to “off”, “play once” (per day), or “on”.
4. Added: Certain characters in the story (human or otherwise) can now be appointed as Assistants. Clear certain maps to unlock them.
